actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to convey the mineral rights in certain real property located in Izard County, Ark., to L. M. Brown, the owner of such real property.

summary.text: Declares that the United States quitclaims all interest in coal and mineral rights in certain land to the owner of that land.

titles.title: A bill to convey the mineral rights in certain real property located in Izard County, Ark., to L. M. Brown, the owner of such real property.
